string-array.name: arrOfPHistories
string-array.item: Hazrat Sultan - Mosque in Astana, the second largest mosque in Central Asia after the mosque in Turkmenistan \"Spirituality of Turkmenbashi.\"; It can accommodate five thousand worshipers, and on holidays - up to 10 thousand people. Area throughout the Hazrat Sultan Mosque is over 13 hectares and construction area of 17,700 square metrov.6 July 2012 at 12:30 opening of mosque \"Hazrat Sultan\".
\"Nur Astana\"; mosque - mosque height of 63 m and is 6.7 hectares, and the total area is 3930 square meters. meters. The opening took place on March 22, 2005. Human Capacity 10,000.

\"Khan Shatyr\"; - a major shopping and entertainment. Opened July 6, 2010. The total area of Khan Shatyr - 127 thousand square meters. The room housed retail trade and entertainment complexes. Including a supermarket, a family park, cafes and restaurants, cinemas, sports facilities, a water park with an artificial beach and swimming pools with wave effect, service and office space, parking for 700 cars and more..

MEGA Astana - a major shopping and entertainment center. The opening of the shopping center on 25 October 2007. The total area of the shopping center is 34 500 m², and the commercial area of 22,640 m². In it is located 87 boutiques, hypermarket area of 2700 m², a hypermarket of toys and children\'s products, children\'s amusement park, a 6-screen cinema multiplex, a food court for 360 beds, 9 cafés and restaurants. Car parking is available in the center of 510 seats..

Asia Park- a large shopping and entertainment center. The opening of the shopping center on 17 December 2009. It is located supermarket \"Alma\"; Film Centre \"Arman 3D\", family entertainment center «Baby Park», a restaurant overlooking the left bank of the «Sky Bar», a fitness club «Fitness First», children\'s store, \"Golden Key\";.

The operator Astana National Academic Theatre of Opera and Ballet. The opening took place on June 21, 2013. The theater is situated on the site of almost 9 hectares. The area of the building is 64 thousand square meters. Of these, about 3000 square meters occupies a scenic area.

Baiterek Tower - Height of buildings is 97 meters with the ball, crowning the construction - 105 meters. The diameter of the ball 22 meters. The monument was built on the initiative of President Nursultan Nazarbayev, a transfer symbol of the capital from Almaty to Astana in 1997. The center installed a wooden globe autographed by representatives of 17 world religions, symbolizing the unity of all religions. The opening took place on August 30, 2002..

Duman - Oceanarium \"Duman\"; entertainment center today is the first and so far the only one in the CIS. This - the only aquarium in the world, located on the ocean in the distance of over 3000 km. The volume of water in the aquarium Kazakh - 3 million liters. For its creation were specially imported 120 tons of sea salt. The aquarium is home to over 2000 species of marine life, marine life from different parts of the world. It is located a souvenir shop, café, zoo -ekzotarium animatronics theater \"Jungle\". The opening took place in May 2003.

Palace of Peace and Reconciliation - the pyramid, created specifically for \"the Congress of Leaders of World and Traditional Religions\"; Pyramid - center of religion and religious tolerance. It holds a concert hall for 1500 seats. Pyramid has become a symbol of unity of different religions, ethnicities and cultures, openness of the people and government worldwide. Pyramids area of ​​28 thousand square meters,;\"Palace of Peace and Accord\"; - It is equipped with modern equipment meeting rooms and exhibition areas, art galleries, presentation systems, and more. Opened September 1, 2006

National Museum - National Museum of the Republic of Kazakhstan-opened July 2, 2014. The museum was created as a result of the state program; \"Cultural Heritage\". It is the largest museum in the country. The total land area of 9.9 hectares, a building area of 74,000 square meters, the exhibition area of 14,095 square meters.

Ice Palace \"Alau\"; - an indoor skating rink in Astana, Kazakhstan. Sports complex for the organization of competitions in speed skating and the organization of training for a mini-hockey, ice hockey, short track, curling, figure skating. Ice Arena consists of a 400-meter ice track with stands for 7,500 seats. It opened in 2011.

Keruen - a large shopping and entertainment center. The opening of the shopping center on July 15, 2009. The total area of the shopping center is 58,000 square meters. In it there are shops, a hypermarket, a 7-screen cinema, cafes and restaurants. Car parking center is designed for 450 seats.

Astana Arena - the stadium can accommodate 30,000 spectators. The stadium was originally, as in the official opening day, called Kazhymukan Stadium in honor of the famous wrestler Kazhymukan Munaitpasov. Later, the stadium has got its present name Astana Arena. Stadium, primarily focused on football, but can easily be adapted for other sports events, including the favorite sports in the country - wrestling, judo and boxing. Opened July 3rd, 2009. Sometimes you can enjoy a concert conducted by stars from different countries.
